Ok guys, i've found the problem.
You need Windows Media Player installed on your pc in order to run the game.
At least it worked for me, tell me if it works for you too :D

Ok guys, i've found the problem.
You need Windows Media Player installed on your pc in order to run the game.
At least it worked for me, tell me if it works for you too.
@LgnLOL Thank you!

I had windows media player installed already, but it was turned off in "Control PanelAll Control Panel ItemsPrograms and Features -> "turn windows features on or off"  -> 'media features' -> windows media player

game works now

Try installing the XNA redistributable.
"The XNA Framework Redistributable provides the necessary runtime components to execute a game on Windows that was developed using Microsoft XNA Game Studio 4.0."
